award: Master in Engineering in Structural Engineering
description: In my Master in Structural Engineering, I advanced my expertise in seismic design, computational modeling, and modern materials for load-bearing structures like buildings and bridges. I learned sophisticated techniques in finite element analysis, structural reliability, and sustainable design to address complex forces, uncertainties, and environmental impacts. This program sharpened my skills in AI integration for engineering practice, forensic analysis of failures, and user-centered visualization, preparing me for innovative roles in consulting and research.

award: Bachelor of Engineering in Civil Engineering
description: I gained a solid foundation in structural analysis, geotechnical engineering, and hydraulics, learning to design safe infrastructure like roads, bridges, and water systems using principles of mathematics, physics, and materials science. I developed proficiency in CAD software, construction management, and site surveying to plan projects, analyze soil properties, and ensure regulatory compliance. These skills honed my problem-solving abilities, enabling me to evaluate real-world challenges in transportation and environmental systems with technical precision.
